disclaimer.terms_of_service: Terms and conditions of the service
disclaimer.description_html: By signing up via SMS, you agree to receive automatic and recurring marketing messages, including shopping cart reminders, on the indicated phone number. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Answer STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for assistance. The frequency of messages may vary. Message and data charges may apply. Displays the%{privacy_policy_link} and i%{terms_of_service_link}.
disclaimer.description_transactional_html: We will send you an order receipt and recurring shipping updates via SMS. Answer STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for assistance. The frequency of messages may vary. Message and data charges may apply. Displays the%{privacy_policy_modal_link} and the %{terms_of_service_modal_link}.

errors.too_long: is too long (must contain at most %{count} characters)

errors.full_name_required: Enter your first and last name

errors.invalid_expiry_year: it is not valid as an expiration year

errors.verify_email: We have sent an email to %{customer_email}: you need to click on the link included to be able to verify your email address.
errors.product_not_available: product was not published for this customer.

customer.no_account_found: No account was found with this email address.
customer.denylisted_reset_password: You could not log into your account because the current password is not secure. You will receive an email to update it.

cart.too_many_items_in_cart: You cannot add any more %{name} to the cart.
cart.all_items_in_cart: All %{count} %{name} are in your shopping cart.
cart.empty_update: it is not possible to update an empty cart
cart.too_many_line_items_error: The cart cannot contain more than %{max} items.
cart.stock_problems_html: One or more selected items are no longer available. There is a cart updated.
cart.product_sold_out: Product '%{name}' is already out of stock.
cart.variant_requires_selling_plan: A variant can only be purchased with a sales plan.

cart.selling_plan_not_applicable: Unable to apply sales plan to variant
cart.digital_product_not_available_for_compan: This item cannot be added to a B2B order

challenge.message: To continue, please let us know that you are not a robot.

subscribed.confirmation: Thank you for joining our mailing list.

unsubscribed.confirmation: You have unsubscribed from our mailing list.
unsubscribed.disclaimer: You will no longer receive marketing updates from us. You can subscribe again at any time.

opt_in.opted_in_html: You have consented to the monitoring of the opening of emails.
opt_in.visibility: Email open rates will be reported anonymously. We'll see if you only opened an email within the overall email open rate.
opt_in.opt_out_html: If you don't want to share this information, you can explicitly refuse from monitoring the opening of emails.
opt_in.preview_bar: You're previewing what customers will see when they explicitly consent to email opening tracking.

opt_out.opted_out_html: You have chosen to opt out of monitoring the opening of emails.
opt_out.visibility: We will not see if you have opened our emails.
opt_out.opt_in_html: You explicitly agree monitoring the opening of emails.
opt_out.preview_bar: You're previewing what customers will see when they explicitly opt out of email opening tracking.

no_longer_track.status_html: We no longer monitor the opening of emails.
no_longer_track.privacy_policy: After sending this email, we have updated our privacy policy and we no longer monitor the opening of emails.

track.visibility: We'll see if you only opened the email within the total email open rate.

updated_policy.visibility: We have updated our policy and now we monitor the opening of emails. Email open rates will be reported anonymously. We'll see if you only opened an email within the total email open rate.
updated_policy.opt_out_html: If you don't want to share this information, you can unsubscribe.
